rules.fullName: Web Open Holds EE Data File1
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Benefits'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Benefits Enrollment'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Annual salary needed for requested Life Ins. enrollment') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Benefits'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Benefits Worksheets'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Bank Account/Routing number error'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing network subplan'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Must mirror parent') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Billing Schedule'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing client operating state(s)'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Bank Account/Routing number error'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Illegible'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Pay Frequency Incorrect/Missing'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'WC rates need to be 0 – self-retaining WC') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Compliance'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Compliance page missing/incomplete'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Need verification of structure and/or owners') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'CSA/PEO081'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing Terms and Conditions pages of the CSA'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Need verification of legal name'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , "Not initialed to self retain workers’ comp"), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'CSA Submitted with Discrepancies') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Financial'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing Acceptable Bank Documentation'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing financial approval') ) ) )

rules.fullName: Web Open Holds EE Data File2
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Medical'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Flex benefits AA incomplete/incorrect/missing'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing medical approval') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Setup Kit'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , '1st check date outside of submission guidelines'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing 1st check date/PEO Effective date'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Pay period incorrect') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Spreadsheet'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing Critical Information on PEO111'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing PEO111'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'PEO111 Missing Employees') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Contractual'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Worksheets'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing current year worksheets'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing ER contributions for HSA setup'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing future year worksheets'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Signature missing') ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Medical Underwriting'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Final Enrollment'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Missing FT/PT Status or Status unclear') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Area__c , 'Workers Comp'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Type__c , 'Final Underwriting'), ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c , 'Policy effective date on COI after PEO Effective Date') ) )

criteriaItems.value: Missing WC approval,PEO111 Ques did not work,Policy effective date on COI after PEO effective date
